name: Smoke and Mirrors
description:
Follow Liesel, an 8-year-old girl who lost herself in a forest of demons. Help her escape and return to reality, along with her best friend, her shadow, who goes by the name of Blake.

Made for the 48-Hour[49 Hour!] Fall Game Jam at UW Stout!

-The game is currently incomplete, due to obvious time restraints. Therefore, please remember to-

"PRESS 'E' at the MIRROR!"

-<3 Blake

Credits: [Created By - N00B*Squad]

Lead Game Designer: Hannah Baker

Lead Programmer: Sam Jahnke

Music and SFX: Brendan Larson

Concept Artist: Veronica Vicich

Story and Dialogue: Paige Yon

Background Artist: Chloe Meyer

Character Artist: Christopher Brewer

Environment Artist: Jake Anderson

...and a whole lotta sprite art from these guys!

-Brendan Larson, Veronica Vicich, Chloe Meyer, Christopher Brewer, Jake Anderson, Paige Yon

Thanks everybody!

-SoundTrack Link - https://soundcloud.com/toxic-sasquatch/sets/smoke-and-mirrors-fall-game-jam-2016

"I won this trophy in a war contest." - Chris
